title: Sanctuary of Eleusinian Demeter in Laconia
description: An extensive sanctuary mentioned by Pausanias and located at the modern village of Kalyvia Sochas by virtue of the discovery of a number of inscriptions on the site. Very little of the sanctuary is visible today, as the site was damaged by a number of floods and only ever partly excavated. Modern signage in the village marks the location of some finds.

properties.description: Representative point derived from comparison of Cook's sketch map and Google Earth imagery (to include a Streetview image showing modern signage identifying the sanctuary area). Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: Imagery Location of Sanctuary
